description:
The Smartwool Intraknit Merino Tech Beanie is a beanie that is made of merino wool and polyester. Run in it, skate-ski in it, or wear it under a helmet for a chilly morning bike commute. With clean seams for a no-bulk fit and the benefits of Merino, the comfort of this hat will help keep you focused on wherever you're headed.

  • It has a 3D-knitting technology that integrates insulation, ventilation, and articulation to enhance your movement and comfort during high-intensity activities
  • The lightest-weight Merino jersey fabric uses a recycled nylon core to increase durability while keeping 100% Merino wool next to skin
  • It also has a knit-in wind protection around the ears and across the forehead, and a targeted mesh ventilation for breathability
name: Smartwool Intraknit Merino Tech Beanie - Unisex
